text: Cretaspira is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Cretaspira include: * Cretaspira cretacea Kuroda, Habe & Oyama, 1971 ==References== * Kuroda, T.; Habe, T.; Oyama, K. (1971). The sea shells of Sagami Bay. Maruzen Co., Tokyo. xix, 1-741 (Japanese text), 1-489 (English text), 1-51 (Index), pls 1-121 ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Cretaspira
